title: Cancel a Product Subscription
description: A customer wants to cancel their recurring monthly subscription for a product.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the recurring subscription for 'Vitamin D'.

tasks.description: Process the cancellation of the subscription.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the subscription status to 'Cancelled'.

tasks.description: Confirm with the customer that the subscription is cancelled and no future charges will be made.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear confirmation to the customer.
